name: Meme Quiz
description:
Is there anything more important than knowledge? How about meme knowledge, huh!?
I have an offer for you:
I get your shiny coins - You get PhD in memology while playing this exciting game!

Gameplay

In this game you will play (oddly enough) meme trivia. So this is literally a meme quiz. It's in the name.
Gameplay looks like this: You pick one of meme categories => Pick a level => Pick the right answer... if your meme knoledge allows it.

Gameplay features:

  • - Memes
  • - More memes
  • - Add to this some more famous memes
  • - Some cringe
